column2: "You made it! Over here."
"A large area at the bottom of the sea. This planet get's more mysterious everyday."
"Zeno would probably say something like, \"That's why it's worth investigating!\"."
"I was wondering who it was. How have you been?"
"Oh it's you, babe. You're weak and yet you still try so hard. Don't you get tired?"
"Hm? If I'm so weak, then you wouldn't mind if smacked you then, right?"
"Are you trying to kill me? Seriously, you need to learn to take a joke."
"It never sounds like you're joking to me."
"Also, even if ARKS aren't up to the task, it's our job to manage somehow."
"Do you get paid to say things like that?"
"S-shut up!"
"Anyways, you'd get eaten by the enemies here. Why don't you hurry up and go home?"
"We came to investigate the facility somewhere in this area."
"Facility, you mean that huge thingy?"
"You know where it is?"
"At least enough to know that you're going in the completely wrong direction."
"I was just warming up!"
"Whatever. Why don't you follow me, I can lead you there."
"Besides, I wouldn't want to leave a hopeless case like you alone down here."
"The Darkness Beyond The Haze"
"第4章 霞の先に映る闇"
